Test class for the Bear class.

  • Constructor Details

    • BearTest

      public BearTest()
      Creates a new BearTest object.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Called before each test is run.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      Called after each test has concluded

    • testDefaultConstructor

      @Test @DisplayName("Bear()") public void testDefaultConstructor()
      Tests the default constructor: Bear(). Does the following three times:
      1. Create a new Bear using the default constructor.
      2. Checks the value of age to ensure it is within the expected range (0 to 9).
      3. Checks the value of gender to ensure it is either MALE or FEMALE.

    • testConstructor

      @Test @DisplayName("Bear(int, Gender)") public void testConstructor()
      Tests the constructor: Bear(int, Gender). Does the following:
      1. Create a new Bear using the above constructor.
      2. Checks the value of age to ensure it is the value that it was set to.
      3. Checks the value of gender to ensure it is the value that it was set to.
      4. Create a new Bear using the above constructor, with an age that is out of bounds.
      5. Check the Bear's age, ensuring that is 9 (the Bear's maxAge)
      6. Check the Bear's gender, ensuring that it is the value it was set to.

    • testMaxAge

      @Test @DisplayName("maxAge()") public void testMaxAge()
      Tests the Bear.maxAge() method:
      1. Tests a Bear who's age is less than the max.
      2. Tests a Bear who's age is the max.

    • testGetAge

      @Test @DisplayName("getAge()") public void testGetAge()
      Tests the Animal.getAge() method. Does the following 5 times:
      1. Generates a random number between 0 and 9 (inclusive).
      2. Creates a new Bear with the randomly generated age.
      3. Ensures that the Bear#getAge() method returns the age generated.

    • testIncrAge

      @Test @DisplayName("incrAge()") public void testIncrAge()
      Tests the Bear.incrAge() method:
      1. Attempt to increment the age of a Bear who's age is less than 9 (the maximum age of a Bear).
      2. Attempt to increment the age of a Bear who's age is 9.

    • testGetStrength

      @Test @DisplayName("getStrength()") public void testGetStrength()
      Tests the Bear.getStrength() method.
      1. Create a Bear of each age (0 to 9).
      2. Check each Bear's strength to ensure that they match up with what is expected for strength.

    • testRandomness

      @Test @DisplayName("Randomness Test") public void testRandomness()
      Tests the randomness of the random generation used to randomly generate a Bear's age and gender. Generates 100 random Bear objects. Then:
      1. Calculates the standard deviation and standard error of the ages of the Bears.
      2. Ensures that the mean age doesn't exceed +/- 2 * standard error (a 95% confidence interval).
      3. Calculates the percentages of the Bears' genders.

    • testToString

      @Test @DisplayName("toString()") public void testToString()
      Tests the Animal.toString() method. Does the following 5 times:
      1. Generates a random age and gender for the Bear.
      2. Creates the Bear object using the above two values.
      3. Ensures that the value returned by Animal.toString() contains each value that the Bear was instantiated with.
